data.name: AsyncAddMethodsMustBeUsed
data.value: When fields are configured with async access methods the async Add methods must be used on the index

data.name: AtLeastOneFieldMustBeIndexed
data.value: At least one field must be configured for an item

data.name: BatchChangeAlreadyStarted
data.value: Cannot start a new batch change while another is already in progress.

data.name: CannotCombineAnEmptySetOfQueryParts
data.value: Cannot combine an empty set of query parts

data.name: EarlierVersionSerializedIndexNotSupported
data.value: The index was serialized with binary serialization version {0} and is incompatible with this release of LIFTI.

data.name: EmptyAdjacentTextPartsAreNotSupported
data.value: Adjacent text query parts cannot be empty

data.name: EmptyBracketedExpressionsAreNotSupported
data.value: Bracketed query parts cannot be empty

data.name: EmptyOrMissingTextQueryFragmentValue
data.value: Internal error - missing text value

data.name: ExpectedAtLeastOneQueryPartParsed
data.value: Expected at least one query part to be parsed

data.name: ExpectedFuzzyMatchToken
data.value: Expected a fuzzy match token - got {0}

data.name: ExpectedTextQueryFragmentAfterMultiCharacterWildcard
data.value: A text fragment must follow a multi-character wildcard in a wildcard expression

data.name: ExpectedTextToken
data.value: Expected a text token - got {0}

data.name: ExpectedToken
data.value: Token expected: {0}

data.name: FieldHasNoAssociatedFieldName
data.value: Field id {0} has no associated field name

data.name: FieldNameAlreadyUsed
data.value: Duplicate field name used: {0}. Field names must be unique across all item types registered with an index.

data.name: FieldNameMustNotBeEmpty
data.value: Name must not be empty

data.name: FuzzyMatchMaxEditDistanceOutOfRange
data.value: Max edit distance values must be in the range 0-65535

data.name: FuzzyMatchMaxSequentialEditsOutOfRange
data.value: Max sequential edit values must be in the range 0-65535

data.name: IdAlreadyUsed
data.value: Id {0} is already registered in the index.

data.name: IndexMustBeEmptyForDeserialization
data.value: An index must be empty when attempting to deserialize its contents.

data.name: ItemAlreadyIndexed
data.value: Item already indexed

data.name: ItemNotFound
data.value: Item not found

data.name: KeyReaderMustBeProvided
data.value: A key reader must be specified with a call to WithKey wen configuring item tokenization options

data.name: MalformedDataExpectedFullLocationEntry
data.value: Malformed index data encountered - expected a full location entry

data.name: MalformedFuzzyMatchParameters
data.value: Malformed parameters for a fuzzy match operator encountered: {0}

data.name: MaximumDistinctFieldsIndexReached
data.value: Only 255 distinct fields can currently be indexed

data.name: MaxTokenLengthExceeded
data.value: Only tokens up to {0} characters long can be indexed.

data.name: MissingIndexTerminator
data.value: The index terminator was not found at the end of the file.

data.name: MissingLiftiHeaderIndicatorBytes
data.value: The expected header bytes could not be found in the stream - this is probably not a serialized index.

data.name: NoBatchChangeInProgress
data.value: No batch change in progress.

data.name: NoDeserializerAvailableForIndexVersion
data.value: No deserializer available for binary serialized version {0}.

data.name: NoReaderDelegatesConfigured
data.value: No reader delegates configured

data.name: NoScorerInitialized
data.value: Attempting to score a query result with no scorer initialized

data.name: NoTokenizationOptionsProvidedForType
data.value: No tokenization options have been provided for type {0}

data.name: SingleCharacterWildcardsFollowingMultiCharacterNotSupported
data.value: Single character wildcards (%) following a multi-character wildcard (*) are not currently supported.

data.name: TimeoutWaitingForWriteLock
data.value: A timeout occurred waiting for index write lock

data.name: UnableToEnumerateIndexedTokensAfterApplyingBookmark
data.value: EnumerateIndexedTokens cannot be called after applying a bookmark

data.name: UnableToReadHeaderInformation
data.value: Unable to read header data from serialized index content.

data.name: UnexpectedEndOfQuery
data.value: The query ended unexpectedly - a token was expected.

data.value: An unexpected operator was encountered: {0}

data.value: Internal error - An unexpected operator was encountered: {0}

data.value: Unknown field '{0}'
